attributes.action: say no to teaching sex education to primary schools kids
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: please dont allow primary school kids to be taught about sexual infections, condoms, contraceptive pill and drugs etc, all this is far too young for them, they should be taught this end of middle school, start of secondary school, please help us to leave these lessons until the right age, i have set up a group on face book, to help get the support for parents to say no, kids that age are far too young, my group is say no to teaching sex education to our primary school kids

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
